Hi,

I have a test case class with 2 methods in it.
In one test method I initialize a private member variable.
In the other I try to use it. 

However, the 2nd test fails everytime with a NullPointerException.
I tried putting an assertNotNull at the end of the first test, which
succeeds. An assertNotNull for the same member variable fails
at the beginning of the next test method.

Does junit initialize all member variables to null between tests?
If so, how can I avoid it? I tried to implement blank setUp() and
tearDown() methods, but that did not work.

Best Regards
Ramanand

subject: Member variables become null between tests?
